title: Die Kuh die lacht
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger cafe with a few outlets. Offers 3 or 4 vegan patties which could be used to substitute the meat patties in a burger. Has vegan sides. Be warned that kitchen uses the same grill and utensils for meat and veg.
